cornflakes.name: Cornflakes
cornflakes.description: Corn flakes, or cornflakes, is a breakfast cereal made from toasted flakes of corn.

cheerios.name: Cheerios
cheerios.description: Cheerios is an American brand of cereal manufactured by General Mills, consisting of pulverized oats in the shape of a solid torus.

shreddies.name: Shreddies
shreddies.description: Shreddies is a breakfast cereal made from lattices of wholegrain wheat.

frosties.name: Frosties
frosties.description: Frosties is a breakfast cereal, produced by the Kellogg Company and consisting of sugar-coated corn flakes.

weetabix.name: Weetabix
weetabix.description: Weetabix is a whole grain wheat breakfast cereal produced by Weetabix Limited in the United Kingdom.
